name: Bound By Plastic
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2021, the theme was 'Joined Together'. 

The game is about a squid and a fish, bound together by a bit of plastic waste. Their goal: to reach the cleaner waters of the surface.

The controls are wacky, but they make it work: 
Fish (Keyboard/Gamepad)
- movement : arrow keys / right stick / (multiplayer gamepad left stick) 
- biting: right shift / X button

Squid (Keyboard/Gamepad)
- movement: WASD/ left stick 
- inkJet: space / Y button

You can play solo or multiplayer (local coop). We recommend Parsec if you want to play with a friend far away.
Sound settings are in 'Options' if you open the game fullscreen.
